TheWay.Text:
the way things are
to know that
would not die
kill me a second time

TheKeeper.Text:
the keeper in me
to embrace the bars
turn the key
be totally consumed

TheLion.Text:
the lion I was
to release it when
feel
care

MeIn.Text:
me in parentheses
to talk sweet maths
can never understand
trust me with the truth
